column1: Happy birthday to my daughter Stacey! 🎉Wishing you a happy and healthy year ahead.

I was saddened to hear about the loss of former State Rep. David McCloskey a Manchester activist and lifelong fighter for New Hampshire's working people. My thoughts are with David's family and loved ones.

Bill O’Brien is the most anti-choice candidate in the #NHsen GOP primary against Jeanne Shaheen. @OBrienForNH would be an automatic vote for Supreme Court judges intent on overturning Roe v. Wade. https://t.co/UexrgHCAnp

39 GOP Senators just took another strike at dismantling critical reproductive rights. We can't look away. We can't back down. Reproductive rights are at risk every single day - and it's up to us to protect our future. https://t.co/LG6jkbBiNm
Happy New Year! We have a lot of work to do together in 2020 and as always I’m grateful for your support and partnership.

Time is running out before tonight's FEC end-of-quarter deadline - the most important of our campaign so far.  We must win here if Democrats are going to take back the Senate but Trump & the GOP are targeting NH to turn red. Fight back and chip in now: https://t.co/kag5m2O7rT

Rep. John Lewis is an American hero and one of the strongest fighters I've ever known. My thoughts are with him and his loved ones. Our nation is rooting for his quick recovery. https://t.co/y2kBFBoknS
Merry Christmas and Happy Holidays from the Shaheen family! Wishing you and yours joy and peace this holiday season.  (Photo credit: Chris Scott) https://t.co/XWIMToNih8
Sending warm wishes to all those celebrating Hanukkah -- chag sameach!

When treatment providers have flexibility in using resources to combat the full scope of substance abuse more people get the help they need.   I'm pleased the bipartisan government funding bill includes my legislation on this critical issue: https://t.co/85FW1Lrx7M
This is a step in the right direction for NH residents looking for more information and transparency around PFAS contamination -- and I'm ready to keep up the fight. https://t.co/cPsDtqHK9V

Investing in our infrastructure doesn't only mean roads bridges and waterways. It also means ensuring access to high-quality broadband services -- especially in rural communities that need it most. https://t.co/52TB8akc8G

There's just one more day to #GetCovered for 2020! Be sure to visit https://t.co/yXLlsAQntu today and find the health care plan that works for you and your family before #OpenEnrollment ends tomorrow.
Time is running out to #GetCovered for 2020. Go to https://t.co/yXLlsAQntu for #OpenEnrollment now through December 15.

Granite Staters deserve answers about the health impacts of PFAS exposure. I'm pleased this study is moving forward and I'll continue to be a partner in the effort to demand action and accountability. https://t.co/XbvcCMijnb
Happy Thanksgiving from the Shaheen family!   (Photo credit: Stefany) https://t.co/9oCfQQJuFb

About a third of women veterans experience intimate partner violence at some point in their lifetime. We need to take immediate steps to improve support services -- help should never be out of reach. https://t.co/MCB26udgHM

The Trump administration continues to put Americans' health at risk by promoting junk insurance plans -- which can lack coverage for pre-existing conditions mental health or prescription drugs.  We must keep fighting their attempts to sabotage our care. https://t.co/JCp48v5oEQ

It was wonderful to be at the Portsmouth Naval Shipyard on Friday to break ground on two major projects that will modernize and optimize the facility. Securing and protecting resources for the shipyard will continue to be a top priority for me. https://t.co/gqRLw4rQJ9

Open enrollment for 2020 health care coverage runs until December 15 -- and many NH families will qualify for tax credits to help pay premiums.  #GetCovered by going to https://t.co/yXLlsAQntu and choose a health care plan that works for you and your family.

We must do everything we can to support survivors of sexual assault.  That's why I wrote the federal Survivors’ Bill of Rights Act which was signed into law in 2016 -- and that's why now I'm working to expand protections for survivors on the state level. https://t.co/gTLM5nJiAC
Happy birthday @ChairmanBuckley! I'm grateful for your leadership and dedication to the @NHDems today and every day.
Veterans and their families make huge sacrifices to protect us and we must honor our commitment to them.  I'm honored to have folks like Jim in my corner: https://t.co/PEqOduueMk

This #VeteransDay we thank the brave Americans who have served and who continue to serve our country -- who put their lives on the line to defend our freedom. We must always ensure that they and their families receive the support and care they deserve.

VP Pence is in NH today to file Trump's name on the primary ballot.  They lost NH by half a percentage point in 2016 -- and they think Republicans can win here in 2020. Don't let the GOP turn NH red. Fight back and join Team Shaheen → https://t.co/oVAY00A0ND
Congratulations to Andrew Hosmer Laconia’s new mayor-elect!  This is a big win for the people of Laconia. Andrew is a thoughtful effective leader -- and I can’t wait to see him get to work.
Congratulations on your victory tonight @JoyceCraigNH!   Looking forward to our continued work together to build a stronger Manchester. https://t.co/wwSPiDTcb7
I'm not going to let them bring us back to a time when men made women's health care decisions. https://t.co/jwkvTiyDyq

TODAY is Election Day!   Have you made a plan to vote? Confirm your polling location here: https://t.co/a255Z4b7Qo  Manchester (6am-7pm): https://t.co/f0f38pEKxK Laconia (8am-6pm): https://t.co/XoHRVzo5FT Keene (8am-7pm): https://t.co/qzKOOMzfdf
Election Day 2020 is one year from today.   We can win this race in New Hampshire and take back the U.S. Senate for Democrats - but only with your help. RT if you’re with us. https://t.co/9BEAuOKmIm
Great to be in Laconia and Manchester this morning with fired up Democrats ready to get out the vote!   Election Day is this Tuesday - make sure you have a plan to vote. https://t.co/nfkfxdZKDh

Today is the first day of ACA open enrollment.   Go to https://t.co/yXLlsAQntu to explore the high-quality affordable health care coverage options for you and your family and #GetCovered today. https://t.co/l8yMIS4DK2

I'm proud to support @JoyceCraigNH's re-election campaign for mayor of Manchester. I know Joyce will continue to deliver real results in her second term.  But she can't win this race without our help. Sign up here to get out the vote this weekend: https://t.co/iebNuN2A7m https://t.co/uKsaDM01u2

Today Senate Dems will force a vote to #ProtectOurCare. We're fighting to:  ➡️ Stop the Trump admin's effort to expand junk health insurance plans that provide fewer benefits ➡️ Protect care for those with pre-existing conditions ➡️ Expand access to quality affordable care

Surprise medical bills can cost patients thousands of dollars and quickly put families' budgets in the red.  I've been working to stop this practice -- but a dark money group has spent millions to deter my efforts confuse voters and put profits ahead of people.  Learn more: https://t.co/QEjWkE1GAp
Happy to be at tonight’s @NHDems Eleanor Roosevelt Dinner with hundreds of fellow Democrats! https://t.co/U1YNc0B50x

Voting is essential to our democracy. One of my GOP opponents has worked to suppress young people's votes claiming they are "foolish" "don't have life experience" and "vote their feelings."  If you agree that's wrong sign on: https://t.co/pkmTMccXcS https://t.co/gAeGrM2NnU

When I first ran for governor there was only one other woman governor in the U.S. Now I'm one of 25 women in the Senate. We've made progress but we still have a long way to go.  We need more women in office at all levels - because when we elect women we all do better. https://t.co/G1nB7VbBxs

This is a reckless dangerous misstep. The climate crisis is real -- and the United States should be leading global efforts to combat it. But the anti-environment Trump administration continues to deny climate change at every turn. https://t.co/AAuPqeHyvl
I won’t stop fighting until we get the Granite State families impacted by PFAS the answers they deserve. https://t.co/VoaZHM4ZUQ

I have led efforts in Congress to uncover the potential health impacts of PFAS in our water supply by authoring and securing funding for the first-ever national health study on this issue -- which I’m pleased to report is now underway.

Combating PFAS contamination is an important priority here in NH and in communities across the country. No one should be forced to question the safety of their drinking water or be exposed to potentially harmful chemicals like these while doing their jobs.
New Hampshire’s 116 breweries make important contributions to our state’s economy. I’m proud to help Granite State brewers grow their businesses and expand their workforces 🍻 https://t.co/iLJRZxMuLK
50 years ago today. Happy anniversary Billy! https://t.co/tlAmaz2mY3

Protecting reproductive rights and access to health care has always been a top priority of mine -- and that's never been more critical than in this era of GOP leaders' attacks on our rights. I'm honored to earn @PPact's endorsement. https://t.co/DY5Apwqjcm

Tomorrow is the Epping special election! @NaomiAndrewsNH will be a strong leader advocating for quality public education fighting for clean air and water and combating the opioid crisis.  Vote for Naomi at Epping Middle School Gym (21 Academy St) tomorrow from 8 a.m. - 7 p.m.!

This is just the latest in a concerted effort to overturn Roe v. Wade and to deny people across the country access to critical reproductive health care.  Our rights are at risk and we must fight this with everything we've got. https://t.co/hA7z4K49Hq

We must win this race if Democrats are going to retake the Senate -- but GOP outside groups have spent more against me than all the other in-cycle Democratic senators COMBINED.  Help me fight back. Chip in before tonight's end-of-quarter deadline: https://t.co/hx7V4jTziG

Today is #NationalVoterRegistrationDay! There's no better way to make your voice heard. Take a moment to make sure you're registered to vote -- and check in with family and friends too: https://t.co/7kpjIEgu61
Congratulations Mayor @JoyceCraigNH! Tonight's decisive results are a testament to your strong record of progress in Manchester. On to November!

Donald Trump is personally recruiting Corey Lewandowski to run for U.S. Senate in New Hampshire and a new SuperPAC is ready to spend millions to help him win. We need to be ready to fight back. Chip in now and join our team: https://t.co/ZdeD1mLILE

Manchester it's primary day! Mayor @JoyceCraigNH is an outstanding leader who's making the Queen City stronger and more vibrant every day.   Polls are open until 7pm. Find your polling location here: https://t.co/UsK5Xci31E

The Violence Against Women Act has helped protect survivors of domestic and sexual violence since it first became law 25 years ago today.  The House reauthorized VAWA in April. It's time for @senatemajldr to do his job and bring this bill up for a vote in the Senate now. #VAWA25

Today we remember the nearly 3000 innocent men women and children we lost on September 11 2001 - including 10 Granite Staters.   We'll never forget the first responders who ran toward danger to save others and the tremendous selflessness and sacrifice made by so many.

I just addressed thousands of fellow Democrats at this year's @NHDems' State Convention. What amazing energy -- Granite Staters are fired up and ready to elect Democrats up and down the ticket! #NHDems2020 https://t.co/0ss3WCqFrV

The opioid epidemic continues to take an immense human toll. I have put forward the Turn the Tide Act to do exactly what the name suggests in the fight against opioids meth and all substance use disorders. #NHDems2020

I believe health care is a human right and all people deserve access to affordable care. I'm fighting for lower costs for health care lower costs for prescription medication and lower insurance premiums. #NHDems2020
We’ve given our veterans more options for health care closer to home.   And we’ve made protecting clean drinking water from harmful contaminants like PFAS a national priority. #NHDems2020

In the Senate I am working every day to make a difference for NH.    We got a 10x increase in funding to help our treatment centers & first responders address the opioid epidemic.   We stopped Trump from cutting funding for the Portsmouth Naval Shipyard to build his border wall.
The @NHDems' State Convention is today! I'll be taking the stage shortly. If you're here tweet your photos and tag @JeanneShaheen! #NHDems2020
Happy birthday @AnnMcLaneKuster! 🎉 I'm grateful today and every day for your leadership here in New Hampshire. Hope you are having a wonderful day!
Happy birthday Speaker @SteveShurtleff! Thank you for everything you do for New Hampshire.
I'll never stop fighting for survivors of domestic and sexual violence -- and the community organizations in New Hampshire and across the country that support them. https://t.co/BJpHjP0NAC

I’ve spent my career fighting for legislation that makes a difference for NH workers: a higher minimum wage stronger equal pay protections increased access to contraception for state employees and more. I will always stand for the labor movement and lift up workers’ voices.

Every day in the U.S. Senate I’m working to strengthen our economy create good-paying jobs and stand up for hard-working Granite Staters and their families. I’m honored to be endorsed by @NHAFLCIO. https://t.co/ef36hY9NAM
Honored to have @StopBigMoney's endorsement. It’s time to put an end to the dark money and special interests rigging our political system and corrupting our democracy. https://t.co/pEMFoSX6iI

Today is #WomensEqualityDay marking 99 years since the certification of the 19th Amendment -- an important milestone in the fight for full equality.  Today and every day we must continue working tirelessly to ensure freedom and equality for all.

The Trump administration's gag rule is an egregious attack on reproductive health care -- jeopardizing access to vital services for millions of people including more than 16000 Granite Staters.  I #StandWithPP in the fight to #ProtectX. https://t.co/BcALjhpQ5O

At his New Hampshire rally tonight Trump made it clear that the GOP is targeting NH's Senate seat in 2020.   Trump and his allies will spend millions to try to defeat me and we need to be ready to fight back. Chip in: https://t.co/eISwPf4CFp

��Donald Trump is coming to New Hampshire for a rally today.🚨  He lost NH by half a percentage point in 2016 -- and he thinks he can win here in 2020. Don't let the GOP turn NH red. Join Team Shaheen → https://t.co/mxOKTh8mqd
New Hampshire’s fire fighters have always been part of the Shaheen family. Honored to have the @PFFNH's earliest ever endorsement for Senate. https://t.co/0vNNwAJRJi
Happy birthday Lou! https://t.co/x7ctPoQucu
Fire fighters are pillars of communities across New Hampshire. I couldn't be more proud to have the @PFFNH's support and look forward to our continued work together. https://t.co/QYqO13H0Uo

This includes expanding SAFER grants that support our local fire departments supporting reauthorization of the 9/11 Victim Compensation Fund and fighting the opioid epidemic -- which fire fighters are on the front lines in combatting.

I'm honored to be endorsed today by the @PFFNH -- their earliest endorsement for Senate in history.  Throughout my time in the U.S. Senate I have advocated for legislation and resources that will strengthen our fire departments and help them keep our state safe.

The news out of El Paso and Dayton is devastating. Gun violence has created far too much destruction and heartbreak in communities across the country. We need universal background checks on gun purchases and an assault weapons ban immediately.

This is a must-win race if Democrats are going to take back the U.S. Senate next year – and we need to grow our team to take on whomever the GOP nominates. Will you join us? https://t.co/o8fAtmHFkf https://t.co/r5GWPtRN9r
Democracy is stronger when more Americans participate in it. We should be encouraging young people to vote not telling them that their voices and their votes are not valued. https://t.co/Keuw6T2qYU

We're just a couple weeks away from one of the best events of the year - our annual Harbor Cruise in Portsmouth! We can't wait to see you there. Grab your tickets here: https://t.co/h0JKpKwzC1 https://t.co/httsZQcy1r
What a beautiful night for the Pelham Democrats’ annual BBQ. Thank you for having me and for everything you all are doing to gear up for 2020! https://t.co/TUap190ES2

The streets of Portsmouth are filled with friends and family celebrating our LGBTQ community for #Pride. There’s so much more to do to ensure equality for everyone but days like today remind us how far we’ve come. 🏳️‍🌈 https://t.co/Ve9nergO8u
Wishing the happiest of birthdays to my good friend @NHKathySullivan. Thank you for all that you do to create a stronger more equitable New Hampshire for all of us.
Manchester is in good hands with @JoyceCraigNH and the whole city is excited to knock on doors and re-elect her in November! #MyChoiceIsJoyce https://t.co/ABvHYktbHA
Grateful for the leadership of @Melanie4Senate who led efforts to establish #Juneteenth as a holiday in New Hampshire. Thank you Melanie. Your advocacy makes us stronger. https://t.co/JLjl8lVAXE

Emancipation ended one of the worst periods in American history but unfortunately communities of color continue to face extreme barriers and inequality. Let's celebrate #Juneteenth but we must also work together to create a stronger future for everyone.
So wonderful to see the #Pride flag flying above Manchester. Grateful to have a leader like @JoyceCraigNH who celebrates every member of our LGBT community. https://t.co/Fe9ORvkPG0
Absolutely right. Thanks for all you do. https://t.co/TBMQf8qExD

#TBT to 20 years ago when I signed into law Martin Luther King Jr. Day ending New Hampshire's status as the only state not to recognize his birthday as an official holiday.   MLK's legacy inspired millions and continues to fuel our fight for justice today. https://t.co/8uxf8ixJlH

Ending gerrymandering is about making our democracy stronger. This should be a bipartisan priority. Great to see @EricHolder and @Schwarzenegger applauding the bipartisan efforts in NH to end partisan gerrymandering. https://t.co/1s44D4Dspz
Love is love always and it’s wonderful to see so many joyful celebrations of our LGBTQ+ community during #PrideMonth in New Hampshire. Happy #Pride to all! https://t.co/AZjrU5cH6t
I repealed an anti-LGBT law that banned same-sex adoption as Governor in 1999 and I'm not going to let the President turn back the clock now. This is absolutely shameful. https://t.co/6WwhOUK0o3

This is so wrong. To deny Harriet Tubman's legacy hurts our entire nation and especially people of color and women. I'll keep pushing for Harriet Tubman on the $20 no matter the Trump admin's petty obstruction. https://t.co/DUX7TA1XCp

We're not going to let them bring us back to the days when men controlled women's health care decisions. Roe vs. Wade is the law of the land and we need to fight to protect it.   Join tomorrow's rally in Concord to #StopTheBans. Link here: https://t.co/ZW7GV6Pdop

Appreciate your leadership @JoyceCraigNH. The right to vote is precious and we have to fight back against voter suppression laws like this that could take away that right from tens of thousands of young people. https://t.co/xft80IaUK1
Great to have you in this fight @JoeBiden. No one should have their right to vote taken away. https://t.co/G1juK7AD8H
Thank you to our firefighters for keeping New Hampshire safe. Grateful for your leadership on #InternationalFirefightersDay and every day. https://t.co/zCkbBEcZTM
Nashua has a strong leader in @JimDonchess. The energy around his campaign is proof the people of Nashua are with him. https://t.co/OIcV3T1hSb
Thanks @JayInslee for standing up for the right to vote! https://t.co/YiaFuZFczk
Wishing a very happy Easter to all of my friends in the Greek-American community! #ChristosAnesti

So excited to have @JoyceCraigNH kick off her re-election campaign! Joyce has been an incredible leader as Mayor of Manchester and the Queen City is fired up and ready for her second term. https://t.co/4eIDZh7F6E
Appreciate @JohnDelaney standing up for the right to vote in New Hampshire and everywhere. https://t.co/IC6y9Ch63f
Absolutely right @sethmoulton. Thank you for condemning this voter suppression law and standing up for the right to vote. https://t.co/lFj8QvH0jW
Appreciate having you in this fight @BernieSanders. No one should have their right to vote taken away. https://t.co/lkcBeERw7K
Thank you @JulianCastro for publicly denouncing the NH voter suppression law that could disenfranchise tens of thousands of young people. https://t.co/1BHIeXesY4
Grateful to have you in this fight @EricHolder. We cannot allow voter suppression in NH or anywhere. https://t.co/SYUCaxftph
Thank you @TimRyan for standing up for Americans' right to vote! https://t.co/7Meq1Uoj6Z
Thanks @Hickenlooper for sending a clear message to anyone seeking to subvert voting rights that we stand for democracy. https://t.co/V6KIbLrmnk
Appreciate @ericswalwell for standing up against this voter suppression law in NH that could lead to tens of thousands of young people losing their right to vote. https://t.co/mYkSNCITlM
Great to have @AndrewYang standing up for NH students who could lose the right to vote because of a recent voter suppression law. https://t.co/jvhCXo6uDL
Wonderful. Appreciate @PeteButtigieg fighting with us against a voter suppression law in NH that could disenfranchise tens of thousands of young people. https://t.co/HvkEPpXhyY
Thanks @SenGillibrand! This is so important to NH. We need to stand up for the right to vote. https://t.co/S7zto3v30D
Thank you @ewarren for signing the petition condemning voter suppression tactics in NH and protecting our voters! https://t.co/rp7q8SJL00
Everyone who is eligible should be encouraged to exercise their right to vote and take an active role in our democracy. Thank you @KamalaHarris for standing up for this right. https://t.co/q7i3uAYlUt

Tens of thousands of young people could lose the right to vote because of a new voter suppression law in NH. I'm asking every presidential candidate to sign this petition to protect the right to vote.   Will you stand up for voting rights too? https://t.co/im4yy7GmAH
That's absolutely right @CoryBooker. Thank you for standing up for NH and for Americans' right to vote. https://t.co/gwbzQLkmf8
Thank you @amyklobuchar for standing up for NH students whose right to vote is under attack. https://t.co/CvhskXkazM
Thank you @BetoORourke for standing up for the right to vote by publicly denouncing the voter suppression law that could disenfranchise tens of thousands of Granite Staters. https://t.co/JugWgjoFLr

I am asking every Presidential candidate to stand up for the tens of thousands of young Granite Staters who could lose the right to vote because of a new voter suppression law in NH. Let's send a message to anyone seeking to subvert voting rights. https://t.co/8sAiuMsXtk

Voter rights are under attack in NH. Tens of thousands of young people could be disenfranchised by photo ID requirements & arbitrary challenges to residency. Tomorrow I'm asking every candidate for President to publicly denounce this voter suppression law. https://t.co/Ga9BOiUGJT

President Trump’s transgender military ban is a stain on our nation. These students want to serve our country and they are some of the bravest people in America. This is so wrong. https://t.co/kK5Vk6Hwi7
This is great news we need more women in all levels of government. Also where can I buy a pair of those awesome socks? https://t.co/qcUe1FEybs
My friend @JoyceCraigNH has been a tremendous leader for Manchester. I am excited to see all she will accomplish for the Queen City during her second term!

It's 2019. How are we still debating whether women deserve the same pay as men? I'm pushing for #EqualPay because my daughters and granddaughters should not have to fight to be compensated fairly for their work.

Congratulations to the new officers of the New Hampshire Young Democrats! The @NHYoungDems are energizing Granite Staters in every community and I'm excited to keep working together to deliver for our state. https://t.co/sk1VtDFP6G
This rings incredibly hollow from an administration looking to strike down the entire Affordable Care Act. We'll keep fighting in Congress to stop their health care sabotage. https://t.co/YMP4yD2lnv
Release the report. America deserves to see it. https://t.co/8f4rUjHPG9
Tonight's the night! Can't wait to see everyone at the @PuritanBackroom tonight for our Snowflake reception. Final opportunity to RSVP here: https://t.co/46GeLNQCOR. https://t.co/k6ShStMLbe

Tomorrow is the big day - our 8th annual Snowflake reception! Can't wait to see you all there at the @PuritanBackroom. If you still need a ticket - grab one here: https://t.co/mq54peSYc9. https://t.co/cRd8BdRILp
Just disgusting. Donald Trump's relentless attempts at smearing a patriot like John McCain dishonor no one but Donald Trump. https://t.co/qgM8ziCENx

Don't forget to sign up for our Snowflake reception this Friday! It's always a good time and you can expect some chicken tenders from the @PuritanBackroom. Grab your ticket here: https://t.co/mq54peSYc9. https://t.co/1I4rAi34Z9
Thank you Anna and congratulations on your election. It is never easy being first to do something. Your strength inspires me and all of New Hampshire. https://t.co/fqdPqcrnJ3
Happy #StPatricksDay to all! Wishing everyone luck and a joyful and safe celebration. https://t.co/mA28EhuMV8

We can't allow massive pharmaceutical companies to continue to jack up prescription drug costs and force NH communities to pay far too much for the medications they need. I'm pushing legislation to change the system. https://t.co/Ny6CXYNT9F
It’s Town Election Day New Hampshire! Local elections are so important to our state and democracy. Make sure to get out to the polls and VOTE.

Huge drug companies continue to put profits over people and it's time for Congress to act. I'm pushing legislation to lower prescription drug costs because these companies are gaming the system and it's a ripoff. https://t.co/6fpiDY3W2c

Appreciate @DartDems taking a break from studying for finals to share their stories with me. Student loan debt is a national crisis and I’ll keep pushing for student loan refinancing because no student should be saddled with this much debt. https://t.co/q9YojzfeVe

We’re having our eighth annual Snowflake reception in just two weeks! It should be a lot of fun and I'm looking forward to seeing many of you there at the @PuritanBackroom. If you haven't purchased a ticket yet you can do so at https://t.co/mq54peSYc9. https://t.co/kU7RrXqjox
We need more women at the table when it comes to foreign policy. Period. #InternationalWomensDay https://t.co/DYrNDFJkk7
I'm not going to let @RealDonaldTrump raid funding for the Portsmouth Naval Shipyard to build a border wall he promised Mexico would pay for. Not going to happen. https://t.co/1ucTrYceD5

Huge internet service companies should not be controlling our access to a free and open internet. Today I introduced legislation to restore #netneutrality protections to save the internet and make sure it's open for everyone. https://t.co/XQo2LCwMLH
Do you live in Concord or Nashua? If so it's election day. There's nothing more important than making your voice heard so get out and VOTE! Polls are open until 7pm in Concord and 8pm in Nashua.
Tomorrow is election day in Concord and Nashua. If you your family or your friends live in either city then make a plan to vote! Your vote matters especially now. Get out and vote!
Our 8th annual Snowflake reception is just around the corner! Looking forward to seeing many of you at the @PuritanBackroom on Friday March 22. Grab your ticket here! https://t.co/mq54peSYc9

“Hope has been in short supply in Washington and across America. The 2020 election could change that which is just one of the reasons we were glad to hear Sen. Jeanne Shaheen say that she plans to run for a third term” More in @ConMonitorNews #NHPolitics https://t.co/ZLDJCDvuOs

Serving NH is a tremendous honor & my work in the Senate is focused on delivering results for Granite Staters. Through bipartisanship and respect for one another we will continue to make progress together! https://t.co/VqqaobrQSX
